original: Majjhima Nikāya 47
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Vīmaṁsakasutta
analyzed: vīmasaka sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “vīmaṁsakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā parassa cetopariyāyaṁ ajānantena tathāgate samannesanā kātabbā ‘sammāsambuddho vā no vā’ iti viññāṇāyā”ti.
analyzed: vīmasakena bhikkhave bhikkhunā parassa cetaḥ pariyāyam a jānantena tathāgate samannesanā kātabbā sammāsambuddhaḥ vā no vā iti viññāṇāya ati

original: “Bhagavaṁmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā, bhagavaṁnettikā bhagavaṁpaṭisaraṇā; sādhu vata,
analyzed: bhagava mūlakāḥ no bhante dhammāḥ bhagava nettikāḥ bhagava paṭisaraṇā sādhu vata

original: bhante, bhagavantaṁyeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho; bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
analyzed: bhante bhagavantayā iva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa atthaḥ bhagavataḥ sutvā bhikkhū dhāressanti iti

original: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhikkhave suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Vīmaṁsakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā parassa cetopariyāyaṁ ajānantena dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabbo cakkhusotaviññeyyesu dhammesu:
analyzed: vīmasakena bhikkhave bhikkhunā parassa cetas pariyāyam a jānantena dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabbo cakkhu sota viññeyyesu dhammesu

original: ‘ye saṅkiliṭṭhā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vā’ti?
analyzed: ye saṅkiliṭṭhāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ savijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vā ati

original: Tamenaṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: tam enam samannesamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘ye saṅkiliṭṭhā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, na te tathāgatassa saṁvijjantī’ti.
analyzed: ye saṅkiliṭṭhāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ na te tathāgatassa savijjanti iti

original: Yato naṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: yatas nam evam jānāti

original: ‘ye saṅkiliṭṭhā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, na te tathāgatassa saṁvijjantī’ti, tato naṁ uttariṁ samannesati:
analyzed: ye saṅkiliṭṭhāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ na te tathāgatassa savijjanti iti tatas nam uttarim samannesati

original: ‘ye vītimissā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vā’ti?
analyzed: ye vītimissāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ sa vijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vāti

original: Tamenaṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: tam enam samannesamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘ye vītimissā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, na te tathāgatassa saṁvijjantī’ti.
analyzed: ye vītimissāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ na te tathāgatassa savijjanti iti

original: Yato naṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: yatas nam evam jānāti

original: ‘ye vītimissā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, na te tathāgatassa saṁvijjantī’ti, tato naṁ uttariṁ samannesati:
analyzed: ye vītimissāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ na te tathāgatassa savijjanti iti tatas nam uttarim samannesati

original: ‘ye vodātā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vā’ti?
analyzed: ye vodātā cakkhu sota viññeyyā dhammā savijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vāti

original: Tamenaṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: tam enam samannesamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘ye vodātā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti te tathāgatassā’ti.
analyzed: ye vodātā cakkhu sota viññeyyā dhammā savijjanti te tathāgatassa ati

original: Yato naṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: yatas nam evam jānāti

original: ‘ye vodātā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti te tathāgatassā’ti, tato naṁ uttariṁ samannesati:
analyzed: ye vodātā cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ savijjanti te tathāgatassa ati tatas nam uttarim samannesati

original: ‘dīgharattaṁ samāpanno ayamāyasmā imaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ, udāhu ittarasamāpanno’ti?
analyzed: dīgharattam samāpannaḥ ayam āyasmai imam kusalam dhammaḥ udāhu ittara samāpannaḥ ti

original: Tamenaṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: tam enam samannesamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘dīgharattaṁ samāpanno ayamāyasmā imaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ, nāyamāyasmā ittarasamāpanno’ti.
analyzed: dīgharattam samāpannaḥ ayam āyasmai imam kusalam dhamma na ayam āyasmai ittara samāpannaḥ ti

original: Yato naṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: yatas nam evam jānāti

original: ‘dīgharattaṁ samāpanno ayamāyasmā imaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ, nāyamāyasmā ittarasamāpanno’ti, tato naṁ uttariṁ samannesati:
analyzed: dīgharattam samāpannaḥ ayam āyasmai imam kusalam dhamma na ayam āyasmai tatas naṃ uttarim samannesati

original: ‘ñattajjhāpanno ayamāyasmā bhikkhu yasappatto, saṁvijjantassa idhekacce ādīnavā’ti?
analyzed: ayam āyasmā bhikkhu yasa ppatto sa vijjantassa idha ekacce ādīnavāti

original: Na tāva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno idhekacce ādīnavā saṁvijjanti yāva na ñattajjhāpanno hoti yasappatto.
analyzed: na tāva bhikkhave bhikkhuno idha ekacce ādīnavā savijjanti yāva na hoti yasa ppatto

original: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ñattajjhāpanno hoti yasappatto, athassa idhekacce ādīnavā saṁvijjanti.
analyzed: yatas ca kho bhikkhave bhikkhu hoti yasa ppatto athassa idha ekacce ādīnavā savijjanti

original: Tamenaṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: tam enam samannesamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘ñattajjhāpanno ayamāyasmā bhikkhu yasappatto, nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā saṁvijjantī’ti.
analyzed: ayam āyasmā bhikkhu yasa ppatto na assa idha ekacce ādīnavā sa vijjanti iti

original: Yato naṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: yatas nam evam jānāti

original: ‘ñattajjhāpanno ayamāyasmā bhikkhu yasappatto, nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā saṁvijjantī’ti, tato naṁ uttariṁ samannesati:
analyzed: ayam āyasmā bhikkhu yasa patto na assa idha ekacce ādīnavā savijjanti iti tatas nam uttarim samannesati

original: ‘abhayūparato ayamāyasmā, nāyamāyasmā bhayūparato;
analyzed: ayam āyasmā na ayam āyasmā bhayūparataḥ

original: vītarāgattā kāme na sevati khayā rāgassā’ti?
analyzed: vīta rāga ttā kāme na sevati khayā rāgaḥ sa ati

original: Tamenaṁ samannesamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: tam enam samannesamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘abhayūparato ayamāyasmā, nāyamāyasmā bhayūparato;
analyzed: ayam āyasmā na ayam āyasmā bhayūparataḥ

original: vītarāgattā kāme na sevati khayā rāgassā’ti.
analyzed: vīta rāga ttā kāme na sevati khayā rāgaḥ sa ati

original: Tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ pare evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
analyzed: tat ce bhikkhave bhikkhum pare evam puccheyyu

original: ‘ke panāyasmato ākārā, ke anvayā, yenāyasmā evaṁ vadesi—
analyzed: ke pana ayasmataḥ ākārā ke anvayāḥ yena ayasmai evam vadesi

original: abhayūparato ayamāyasmā, nāyamāyasmā bhayūparato;
analyzed: ayam āyasmā na ayam āyasmā bhayūparataḥ

original: vītarāgattā kāme na sevati khayā rāgassā’ti.
analyzed: vīta rāga ttā kāme na sevati khayā rāgaḥ sa ati

original: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: sammā byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu evam byākareyya

original: ‘tathā hi pana ayamāyasmā saṅghe vā viharanto eko vā viharanto, ye ca tattha sugatā
analyzed: tathā hi pana ayam āyasmā saṅghe vā viharantaḥ ekaḥ vā viharantaḥ ye ca tattha sugatā

original: ye ca tattha duggatā, ye ca tattha gaṇamanusāsanti, ye ca idhekacce āmisesu sandissanti,
analyzed: ye ca tattha duggatāḥ ye ca tattha gaṇam anusāsanti ye ca idha ekacce āmisesu sandissanti

original: ye ca idhekacce āmisena anupalittā, nāyamāyasmā taṁ tena avajānāti.
analyzed: ye ca idha ekacce āmisena an upalittāḥ tam tena avajānāti

original: Sammukhā kho pana metaṁ bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
analyzed: sammukhā kho pana mā etam bhagavataḥ sutam sammukhā paṭiggahita

original: abhayūparatohamasmi, nāhamasmi bhayūparato, vītarāgattā kāme na sevāmi khayā rāgassā’ti.
analyzed: a bhaya uparataḥ ham asmi na aham asmi bhaya uparataḥ vīta rāga ttā kāme na sevāmi khayā rāgaḥ ati

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgatova uttariṁ paṭipucchitabbo:
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave tathāgataḥ uva uttarim paṭipucchitabbaḥ

original: ‘ye saṅkiliṭṭhā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vā’ti?
analyzed: ye saṅkiliṭṭhāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ savijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vā ati

original: Byākaramāno, bhikkhave, tathāgato evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave tathāgataḥ evam byākareyya

original: ‘ye saṅkiliṭṭhā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, na te tathāgatassa saṁvijjantī’ti.
analyzed: ye saṅkiliṭṭhāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ na te tathāgatassa savijjanti iti

original: ‘Ye vītimissā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vā’ti?
analyzed: ye vītimissāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ sa vijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vāti

original: Byākaramāno, bhikkhave, tathāgato evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave tathāgataḥ evam byākareyya

original: ‘ye vītimissā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, na te tathāgatassa saṁvijjantī’ti.
analyzed: ye vītimissāḥ cakkhu sota viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ na te tathāgatassa savijjanti iti

original: ‘Ye vodātā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vā’ti?
analyzed: ye vodātā cakkhu sota viññeyyā dhammā savijjanti vā te tathāgatassa no vāti

original: Byākaramāno, bhikkhave, tathāgato evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave tathāgataḥ evam byākareyya

original: ‘ye vodātā cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, saṁvijjanti te tathāgatassa;
analyzed: ye vodātā cakkhu sota viññeyyā dhammā savijjanti te tathāgatassa

original: etaṁ pathohamasmi, etaṁ gocaro, no ca tena tammayo’ti.
analyzed: etam pathā uham asmi etam gocaraḥ na u ca tena

original: Evaṁvādiṁ kho, bhikkhave, satthāraṁ arahati sāvako upasaṅkamituṁ dhammassavanāya.
analyzed: eva vādim kho bhikkhave satthāram arahati sāvakaḥ upasaṅkamitum dhamma ssavanāya

original: Tassa satthā dhammaṁ deseti uttaruttariṁ paṇītapaṇītaṁ kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgaṁ.
analyzed: tassa satthā dhammam deseti uttaruttarim paṇīta paṇītam kaṇha sukka sappaṭibhāga

original: Yathā yathā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno satthā dhammaṁ deseti uttaruttariṁ paṇītapaṇītaṁ
analyzed: yathā yathā kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno satthā dhammam deseti uttaruttarim paṇīta paṇīta

original: kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgaṁ tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme abhiññāya idhekaccaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: kaṇha sukka sappaṭibhāgam tathā tathā saḥ tasmin dhamme abhiññāya idha ekaccam dhamma

original: dhammesu niṭṭhaṁ gacchati, satthari pasīdati:
analyzed: dhammesu niṭṭham gacchati satthari pasīdati

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipanno saṅghaḥ iti

original: Tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ pare evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
analyzed: tat ce bhikkhave bhikkhum pare evam puccheyyu

original: ‘ke panāyasmato ākārā, ke anvayā, yenāyasmā evaṁ vadesi—
analyzed: ke pana ayasmataḥ ākārā ke anvayāḥ yena ayasmai evam vadesi

original: sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’ti?
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipanno saṅghaḥ iti

original: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: sammā byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu evam byākareyya

original: ‘idhāhaṁ, āvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁ dhammassavanāya.
analyzed: idha āha āvuso yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamim dhammassavanāya

original: Tassa me bhagavā dhammaṁ deseti uttaruttariṁ paṇītapaṇītaṁ kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgaṁ.
analyzed: tassa me bhagavā dhammam deseti uttaruttarim paṇīta paṇītam kaṇha sukka sappaṭibhāga

original: Yathā yathā me, āvuso, bhagavā dhammaṁ deseti uttaruttariṁ paṇītapaṇītaṁ kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgaṁ
analyzed: yathā yathā me āvuso bhagavā dhammam deseti uttaruttarim paṇīta paṇītam kaṇha sukka sappaṭibhāga

original: tathā tathāhaṁ tasmiṁ dhamme abhiññāya idhekaccaṁ dhammaṁ dhammesu niṭṭhamagamaṁ, satthari pasīdiṁ—
analyzed: tathā tathā aham tasmin dhamme abhiññāya idha ekaccam dhammam dhammesu niṭṭham agama satthari pasīdi

original: sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā, dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipanno saṅghaḥ iti

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi tathāgate saddhā
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi tathāgate saddhā

original: niviṭṭhā hoti mūlajātā patiṭṭhitā, ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ākāravatī saddhā dassanamūlikā, daḷhā;
analyzed: niviṭṭhā hoti mūla jātā patiṭṭhitā ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave ākāravatī saddhā dassana mūlikā daḷhā

original: asaṁhāriyā samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
analyzed: samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenacid vā

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tathāgate dhammasamannesanā hoti.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave tathāgate dhamma samannesanā hoti

original: Evañca pana tathāgato dhammatāsusamanniṭṭho hotī”ti.
analyzed: evam ca pana tathāgataḥ dhamma tā su samanniṭṭhaḥ hoti iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Vīmaṁsakasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
analyzed: vīmasaka suttam niṭṭhitam sattama
